We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private LinearWeightedMovingAverage _lwma;
// In Initialize()
_lwma = LWMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_lwma.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Warm Up Period", _lwma.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Period", _lwma.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Is Ready", _lwma.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Current", _lwma.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Name", _lwma.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Samples", _lwma.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.lwma = self.LWMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.lwma.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Warm Up Period", self.lwma.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Period", self.lwma.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Is Ready", self.lwma.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Current", self.lwma.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Name", self.lwma.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LWMA Samples", self.lwma.Samples);
